title: Animate Dead
content: uls instead of 1, need 3 corpses. Animate Dead: Flying Ghoul Level 5 Spell Slot Until Long Rest 3m Create a ghoul that specialises in melee combat. The target must be a medium or small corpse. STR 16, DEX 17, CON 10, INT 11, WIS 10, CHA 8 HP: 30 AC: 15 Claws: Lash out with deadly claws dealing 3d6 + Strength Modifier Slashing damage and possibly Paralyse the target. Devour: Bite a knocked out, prone, or sleeping target, and deal 3d10 + Strength Modifier Slashing damage. Heal that many hit points
